dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Understand Applying and Expanding DHIS 2 DHIS2 has emerged as the globally accepted standard for online health information systems HIS in low and middle income countries The open source application is used in 47 countries and 23 organizations for reporting of routine HIS data This session will delve into DHIS 2 and how different programs are embracing this open source system as a robust HMIS in LMICs Join the experts as they will delve into the essential intersection of health information systems and metrics Audiences already familiar with DHIS 2 will find this session useful to learn how programs harnessing the principles for digital development are expanding the DHIS 2 platform to gather and use data Presented by Elizabeth Hazel Senior Research Associate Institute for International Programs Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
Expanding the DHIS2 Platform for Improved Monitoring and Evaluation of MNCHAndN Programs
